item.title: GitHub
item.description: Activate pages -Repository -> Settings -> Options -> GitHub Pages Actions (workflow) Create file : .github/workflows/workflow.yml Example (auto build hugo static site generator on master push) : name: Build Site on: push: branches: - master jobs: build: runs-on: ubuntu-latest steps: - name: Checkout Repo uses: actions/checkout@master with: submodules: true - name: Build Site uses: chabad360/hugo-actions@master
